properties.description: Can be changed at any point between now and final submission.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Must match name in student records exactly. Use for first name and middle name or initial if applicable.
properties.title: Author First Name/Given Name

properties.description: Must match name in student records exactly.
properties.title: Author Last Name/Family Name

properties.description: Optional: If you have an ORCID iD, enter your 16 digit ORCID in the following format: xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx. If not, leave this box empty. More information at orcid.org.
properties.title: Author Identifier (ORCID iD)

properties.description: Select your month and year of graduation (regardless of when you submit or defend your thesis). Choose May for spring graduation, August for summer graduation, or December for fall graduation.
properties.title: Date of Award

properties.description: Use for degree name (e.g., Bachelor of Science, Bachelor of Arts, etc.)
properties.title: Name

properties.description: Use to specify major (e.g., Architecture, Philosophy, Chemistry, etc.)

index.key: Biochemistry and Cellular and Molecular Biology

options.index: Biochemistry and Cellular and Molecular Biology

properties.title: Discipline

properties.description: Enter first name and, if used, middle name or initial. Do not include honorifics or titles such as “Dr.” or “PhD.” Examples: Stephen G. or Ruth Bader.
properties.title: ADVISOR/MAJOR PROFESSOR FIRST NAME/GIVEN NAME

properties.description: Enter family name or last name. Examples: Breyer or Ginsburg.
properties.title: ADVISOR/MAJOR PROFESSOR LAST NAME/FAMILY NAME

properties.description: Enter first name and, if used, middle name or initial. Do not include honorifics or titles such as “Dr.” or “PhD.” Examples: Stephen G. or Ruth Bader.
properties.title: COMMITTEE MEMBER/ADDITIOINAL ADVISOR FIRST NAME/GIVEN NAME

properties.description: Enter family name or last name. Examples: Breyer or Ginsburg.
properties.title: COMMITTEE MEMBER/ADDITIONAL ADVISOR LAST NAME/FAMILY NAME

properties.description: Enter the abstract for your thesis. It cannot exceed 350 words.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: Add comments, e.g., “Portions of this document were previously published in journal...". Text in this box will be made public with your thesis, so this should not be used as a space to communicate with the thesis manager.
properties.title: Comments

create.value: <accessCondition type="local rights statement"> Unless otherwise noted, (c) the Author(s).</accessCondition>
